patthana21.41:1.1_0: Nasanidassanaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassano sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.41:1.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana21.41:2.1_0: Nasanidassanaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassano anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.41:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana21.41:3.1_0: Nasanidassanaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassano anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.41:3.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
